title: #277: Krav Maga – The Self-Defense System of Israeli Special Forces
description: Today on the podcast, I talk to David Kahn, chief instructor at the U.S. Israeli Krav Maga Association and the author of several books on the topic, including Krav Maga Defense. Today on the show, David and I discuss the origins and history of Krav Maga, its philosophy, its fundamental moves, and how to use it in a defensive scenario.
author: contact@artofmanliness.com (The Art of Manliness)
